name: Cardinal Dominus, Orfist Regis
effect:
[AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (VC), choose up to one World card from your hand or drop, and put it into the order zone.
[AUTO](VC):When this unit attacks, if your World is Abyssal Dark Night, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & discard a card from hand], and for every two World cards in your order zone, call up to one Shadow Army token to (RC), and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of that battle. (If there are four World cards, [Power] +10000)
productName: [VGE-D-SS08] Cardfight!! Vanguard Special Series 08: Stand Up Deckset “Orfist”

name: Cardinal Noid, Cubisia
effect:
[AUTO](VC):When a World is put into your order zone, choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
[CONT](RC):During your turn, if your World is Abyssal Dark Night, this unit gets [Power] +5000.
productName: [VGE-D-SS08] Cardfight!! Vanguard Special Series 08: Stand Up Deckset “Orfist”

name: Cardinal Noid, Routis
effect:
[AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (VC), search your deck for up to one World card, reveal it and put it into hand, and shuffle the deck.
[CONT](RC):During the battle this unit attacked or boosted, if your World is Dark Night or Abyssal Dark Night, this unit gets [Power] +2000.
productName: [VGE-D-SS08] Cardfight!! Vanguard Special Series 08: Stand Up Deckset “Orfist”

name: Cardinal Fang, Phovi
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon, if you went second, draw a card.
productName: [VGE-D-SS08] Cardfight!! Vanguard Special Series 08: Stand Up Deckset “Orfist”

name: Cardinal Dragon, Nuvorea
effect:
[AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks, this unit gets [Power] +2000 until end of that battle for each World in your Order Zone.
[AUTO]:When this unit is retired from (RC), if your World is Abyssal Dark Night, you may call a Shadow Army token to (RC).
productName: [VGE-D-SS08] Cardfight!! Vanguard Special Series 08: Stand Up Deckset “Orfist”

name: Cardinal Draco, Culjameed
effect:
[CONT](RC):If your World is Dark Night or Abyssal Dark Night, this unit gets "Boost", and can intercept from the back row.
[CONT](GC):If your World is Abyssal Dark Night, this unit gets [Shield] +10000.
productName: [VGE-D-SS08] Cardfight!! Vanguard Special Series 08: Stand Up Deckset “Orfist”

name: Caradinal Noid, Grunder
effect:
[AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) from hand, if your World is Dark Night or Abyssal Dark Night, you may look at the top seven cards of your deck. If you do, choose up to two World cards from among the cards looked at, discard them, and shuffle the deck.
[AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle this unit attacked a vanguard, if your World is Abyssal Dark Night, [COST][retire this unit], choose a World card from your drop, and put it into hand.
productName: [VGE-D-SS08] Cardfight!! Vanguard Special Series 08: Stand Up Deckset “Orfist”

name: Polarxis Dragon
effect:
[AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if you have a vanguard with "Orfist" in its card name, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], choose a World card with a different card name from the cards in your order zone from your drop, and put it into the order zone.
[AUTO]:When this card is put into drop from (RC) or hand during your battle phase, if your World is Dark Night or Abyssal Dark Night, you may draw a card.
productName: [VGE-D-SS08] Cardfight!! Vanguard Special Series 08: Stand Up Deckset “Orfist”

name: Cardinal Principle, Cagula
effect:
[AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) , if your World is Dark Night, you may [Soul-Charge 1]. If it is Abyssal Dark Night instead of Dark Night, you may [Soul-Charge 2].
[ACT](RC):If your World is Abyssal Dark Night, [COST][Soul-Blast 1 & retire this unit], and call a Shadow Army token to (RC).
productName: [VGE-D-SS08] Cardfight!! Vanguard Special Series 08: Stand Up Deckset “Orfist”

name: Violate Dragon
effect:

[AUTO]:When this unit is put on (GC), choose one of your units, and it cannot be hit until end of that battle. If your hand has two or more cards, choose a card from hand, and discard it.
productName: [VGE-D-SS08] Cardfight!! Vanguard Special Series 08: Stand Up Deckset “Orfist”

name: Star Dragon Deity of Infinitude, Eldobreath
effect:
(You may only have one [Over] trigger in a deck. When revealed as a trigger, remove that card, draw a card, choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] +100 Million until end of turn! If revealed during drive check, activate its additional effect!)
Additional Effect - Double the [Power] and [Critical] of all of your front row units until end of turn! (Increase to double its [Power] and [Critical] when activated)

name: Overcoming an Eternity
effect:
(After a set order is played, put it into your order zone)
Play this with [COST][Soul-Blast 2]!
[CONT]Order Zone:If your order zone only has World cards, the following effects are active according to the number of cards in your order zone.
・1 card ‐ Your World becomes Dark Night.
・2 or more cards ‐ Your World becomes Abyssal Dark Night.
[AUTO]Order Zone:When your Shadow Army token is placed, that placed unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
productName: [VGE-D-SS08] Cardfight!! Vanguard Special Series 08: Stand Up Deckset “Orfist”

name: Abent Robust

name: Elementaria Sanctitude
effect:

[CONT]:You may only have one "Elementaria Sanctitude" in a deck.

Choose one of your units, and it cannot be hit until end of that battle. Remove this card.
